name: CAPSULE FALL
description:
Flee deeper and deeper into the depths, so you won't get engulfed in hot magma.

STORY

You have a fancy, state of the art capsule.

You need to flee  from the impeding doom from above a.k.a. magma.

You flee down an old abandoned mineshaft, which was long ago stipped bare of any ore.

The capsule can move faster than time itself, but has no downwards thrusters, so you have to let gravity do the work to get deeper and deeper into the depths.

GAMEPLAY TIPS

If you move fast enough gravity won't get you.

Magma moves faster when you get further away from it.

The deeper you get within one minute of play time, the better your highscore is. (Classic Game)

This was made for the Ludum Dare 48 in 48 hours.

Controls are mentioned in the main menu of the game.
